Name: value(scenario)
Documentation:
The value of a spot contract is easy to understand because it
is simply the result of applying the spot exchange rate in the provided scenario
to the amount of the contract

Name: value(scenario)
Documentation:
- A key feature of the option structure is the polymorphic operation
value (Scenario). 
- technique Black-Scholes analysis

Name: call [derived]
Documentation:
- Call and put are terms derived from the longs and shorts.

- A call is an option to buy (that is, a
long contract),

Name: combination product
Documentation: - combination options can be seen as a composite of other options.

Name: delivery date
Documentation:
Without considering holidays,
we can determine the delivery date by a simple calculation between date and
tenor

Name: delivery date
Documentation:
Without considering holidays,
we can determine the delivery date by a simple calculation between date and
tenor

Name: long
Documentation: contract can be long (buy) or short (sell).

Name: option
Documentation:
We can sell an option to sell money,
sell an option to buy money, buy an option to sell money, or buy an option to
buy money. 

- опцион это как купон на льготную цену
- An option gives the buyer the right to buy dollars at a
prearranged exchange rate if the holder wishes

- in the money  LingvoEconomics - 
бирж. ситуация, при которой цена использования опциона выгоднее рыночной

prearranged price /  назначенная цена

Name: product
Documentation:
The key difference between a product and a contract is that the product
represents the customer's intention while the contract refers to what actually gets
traded between the counter and primary parties

Name: put [derived]
Documentation: put is an option to sell (a short contract).

Name: spread
Documentation:
-  spread is two
options, but both options are the same direction (that is, two calls or two puts)
at different prices.

Name: tenor
Documentation:
- срок действия
- The tenor is the period between the trade date and the delivery
date
- The tenor is based on the difference between trade and delivery dates

Name: 2 legs, both calls with same expiry
2 legs, both puts with same expiry
2 legs: 1 call  1 put, both long OR both short
2 legs: 1 long  1 short, of wich 1 call, 1 put
all legs calls OR all legs puts
strike prices of legs are the same
delivery date = trade date + tenor + next working day
long option + long contract or short option + short contract
long option + short contract or short option + long contract
